description.value: Your army’s leaders attempt to bolster the soldiers’ morale and fight back the effects of fear and panic. Attempt a Morale check against a target enemy army of your choice. Critical Success If your army is routed, it loses the routed condition. Reduce your army’s shaken condition by 2. Success Reduce your army’s shaken condition by 1. Critical Failure Your attempt to rally backfires—increase your army’s shaken condition by 1.
